title: The Castle - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Betrayal   Handsome Male Lead   Love at First Sight   Marriage   Modern Day   R-15   Royalty
author: Jin Soye   진소예
description:
Crown Prince Lee Geon, the gem of the Korean Royal Family, was an unrivaled descendent and the owner of Gyeongbokgung Palace.

Jo Yoo-yeon was a beauty whose delicate gleaming eyes enchanted him and took his breath away.

“Seeing the level of lies you are sprouting, I’m curious.”

“I’m sorry…”

“What have you seen and heard so far? And why did you hide it?”

She felt as if her heart was about to explode. Her chest felt heavy as if she was suffering from a disease she was not aware of.

“This is the first time in royal history… What a fake marriage.”

He was furious.

Six months ago…

She cheated on the most famous man in Korea to get married to him.

To be exact, to the 30th king of Korea.

To the Crown Prince Lee Geon.>
